pattern.title: Schema uses only known attribute groups

assert.test: some $ref in resolve-QName(@ref, .) satisfies ( $ref = xs:QName('structures:SimpleObjectAttributeGroup') or namespace-uri-from-QName($ref) = (xs:anyURI('urn:us:gov:ic:ism'), xs:anyURI('urn:us:gov:ic:ntk')))

rule.assert: Rule 9-38: An attribute group reference MUST be structures:SimpleObjectAttributeGroup.
